item.title: YTD return of EM curencies
item.description: body { text-align: justify} Introduction The goal of this short article is to analyze the Emerging Markets (EM) currencies in light of Coronavirus 2020 Financial Crisis. The main observation is that all of those currencies since mid-Febraury 2020 significantly weakened in comparison to EUR or USD. Specification of Currencies The currencies that are going to be analyzed as a part of this analysis has been chosen arbitrarly. Most of them, apart from CZK and UAH are a part of the iShares Core MSCI World UCITS ETF.
